showScoreExcerpt:
"It’s a performance of startling inventiveness and precision, simultaneously conspiratorial and confrontational. His persuasive storytelling is dense with detail...But what looks like a one-man show in fact relies on the invisible efforts of a brilliant technical crew. Inevitably it’s the richly layered sound design by Gareth Fry that impresses most...'The Encounter' is a hypnotic, almost religious experience that warrants those two much-abused terms, 'immersive' and 'unmissable'."
